name: 葉樹開
objective:
主要課程內容包含電腦基本常識，程式設計簡介，
資料型態，流程控制，函式，副程式，陣列與字串，
檔案，應用程式設計。
schedule:
1.　　An overview to Matlab
2.　　Introduction to Structural Arrays
3.　　Functions and Files
4.　　Programming with Matlab
5.　　Plotting and Model Building
6.　　Linear Algebraic Equations
7.　　Probabilities, Statistics and Interpolation
8.　　Introduction to Calculus and Differential Equations
9.　　Simulink
10.　　Symbolic Processing with Matlab
scorePolicy:
Grades will be determined from a composite score of all graded materials, consisting of: two midterm exams, homework problems, and the comprehensive final exam. Weights used to determine the final score will be:
1.　　Homework problems, 30%
2.　　In-Class Activities, Quizzes 15%
3.　　Midterm exam, 25%
4.　　Final Exam 30%
請特別注意 若發現作業有抄襲者, 該次作業以全班最低分計算
materials:
References:
1.　　Purda Pratap, Getting Started with Matlab, Oxford University Press, 2002
2.　　Stephen J. Chapman, Matlab Programming for Engineers , 4th edition, CL-Engineering, 2007
